parameter.name: a_q_b__x
parameter.comment: x component of quaternion (takes vector in b frame to a frame)

parameter.name: a_q_b__y
parameter.comment: y component of quaternion (takes vector in b frame to a frame)

parameter.name: a_q_b__z
parameter.comment: z component of quaternion (takes vector in b frame to a frame)

parameter.name: a_q_b__w
parameter.comment: w component of quaternion (takes vector in b frame to a frame)

parameter.name: a_r_b__x
parameter.comment: x component of translation from origin of a frame to origin of b frame

parameter.name: a_r_b__y
parameter.comment: y component of translation from origin of a frame to origin of b frame

parameter.name: a_r_b__z
parameter.comment: z component of translation from origin of a frame to origin of b frame

parameter.name: doRotX
parameter.comment: whether to rotate the position; false for going between two body frames

parameter.name: doRotV
parameter.comment: whether to rotate the linear velocity; false for going between two body frames if velocity is in world frame
